title: Manage Mine Dewatering System
description: An environmental engineer manages the mine's dewatering system to prevent flooding in the pit while ensuring discharged water meets quality standards.

tasks.description: Check the water level in the main pit sump.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows the water level is rising after a heavy rainfall event.

tasks.description: Start an additional dewatering pump to increase the pumping rate from the pit to the water treatment plant.
tasks.expected_outcome: An extra pump is turned on to handle the increased inflow.

tasks.description: Verify that the water treatment plant is operating correctly and the final discharged water is compliant.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the treatment plant is handling the extra flow and water quality remains within limits.
